text: e inheritance - Coma - Decreased circulating cortisol level - Failure to thrive - Hyperpigmentation of the skin - Increased circulating ACTH level - Recurrent hypoglycemia - Recurrent infections - Seizures - Tall stature - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
